title: Tickler's Scrumptious Cheese Straws with Pineapple Salsa
ingredients: ['For the cheese straws', '185g self-raising flour, plus extra for dusting', '65g cold butter, cubed', '125g Tickler, finely grated', '25g Tickler, chopped small', '2 medium eggs, beaten', 'Crushed black peppercorns', 'For the pineapple salsa', '200g fresh or tinned pineapple chunks, finely chopped', '1 mild red chilli, finely chopped', '1/2 red onion, finely chopped', '1 teaspoon caster sugar', 'Few sprigs coriander, finely chopped', 'Zest and juice of 1/2 lime']
